pages.body: What sets IBM apart when it comes to cloud

pages.title: Cloud for business growth
pages.body: Implemented with the proper combination of expertise, technology and services, cloud can go far beyond cost savings.

target.title: Think it
target.body: Experts you need to strategize how to use cloud to drive savings, revenue and growth

items.title: How IBM is different
items.body:
* A leader in transformation consulting and industry expertise
* 400-member cloud standards customer council to find out what enterprises need in cloud standards

target.title: Build it
target.body: Private or hybrid cloud, smarter cloud-based products, services, and data analytics

items.title: How IBM is different
items.body:
* More than 5,000 private cloud engagements to date
* 4.5 million daily client transactions through IBM's public cloud
* Integrated enterprise service management capabilities across service and deployment models

target.title: Tap into it
target.body: Instantly tap into analytics, SaaS business applications and hosting in the cloud

items.title: How IBM is different
items.body:
* More than 100 IBM cloud-enabled software-as-a-service (SaaS) offerings
* One of the most comprehensive commerce offerings: business-to-business (b2b) and business-to-consumer (b2c) commerce, global payment service, enterprise marketing management, collaboration, and business analytics
* 7,700 consultants and one of the largest research departments in mathematics in private industry
